Name.enUS: Synoid Vehicle And Ship Plating Level 1
Synoid Vehicle And Ship Plating Level 2
Synoid Vehicle And Ship Plating Level 3

Description.enUS:
Primary structure. Can receive gathered resources. Used to deploy Primary Synoid Structures.

Enables:
- Prospectors
- Myco-Processors

Basic worker unit. Deploys Synoid defensive structures and Myco-Synaptic Choirs.

Can attack ground units.

AOE damage defensive structure.

Can attack ground units, and be upgraded to attack air units.
Detector

Casting Structure. Can deploy spybots, and repair drones to heal mechanical units.
Detector

Highly mobile flying unit.
Each attack drains energy, the drone regenerates energy near a power source.
after the attack connects, the missile detonates a second time shortly after, dealing the remaining damage.

TIP: Summon it within your base to defend it, or take a Buoys into battle in order to be able to deploy it on the field.

Can attack air and ground units.

Low mobility combat drone.
Can survive only for 30 seconds.
after the attack connects, the missile detonates a second time shortly after, dealing the remaining damage.

TIP: Summon it within your base to defend it, or take a Buoys into battle in order to be able to deploy it on the field.

Can attack air and ground units.
A high tower which can receive air-targeting attack. Able to use Mind Control Link ability.

Slow flying surveillance detector with WarpJump ability, can use siege mode to increase area.
Detector

Mobile flying requisition source.
Detector

Mobile flying requisition source.
Detector

Provides supply and Requisition.
Requisition allows you to use Orbital abilities from units and structures.
Can be upgraded to Greater Processor.
Provides extra supply immediately when upgrade starts, increase health and regeneration when upgrade completes.

Infantry-production facility.

Enables:
- Servitors
- Bio-Synthetics Facility from Myco-Synaptic Choir

Upgraded Infantry-production facility with 50% faster production.

Enables:
- Atrocity
- Cremator

Small size ranged troopers. The upgrade Everyman Ordinance Ensamble at Bio-Synthetics Facility can make them more durable and receive an anti-air splash weapon.
Can attack ground units, and if upgraded, can attack air units as well.

TIP: Servitors gain a lot more power after the receiving the upgrade.

High damage range unit with lower vital. Can use Psionic Pulse, Ultrasonic Pulse and Personal Cloaking abilities.
Weapon causes residential Bleeding damage for an extra 0 damage.
Regenerates energy with each attack on enemy units.

Can attack ground and air units.

Fast melee creature. Lasts 20 seconds.

TIP: This unit has reduced collision radius to allow for slightly more DPS, go nuts.

Can attack ground units.

Heavy-fire support unit.
The upgrade Psionic Shield Matrix at Bio-Synthetics Facility can give them additional shield.
Can attack ground and air units.

Tanky anti-light flametrooper with splash damage.
The upgrade Phalanx Barrier at Bio-Synthetics Facility can give them another weapon which shot between 3 and 3.6 range and fire simultaneously with other weapons.
Can attack ground units.

Mech-production facility.

Enables:
- Iron Fletcher
- Censer
- Munitions Depot from Myco-Synaptic Choir

Upgraded mech-production facility with 50% faster production.

Enables:
- Enthralled
- Rancor

Quick anti-light assault unit.
Can quickly morph into anti-armored and tanky charged form.
Can attack ground units.

Quick assault unit that applies damage stacks with each attack. Each stack adds +2 bonus damage per attack from any unit, with a maximum of 4 stacks per targeted unit.

Can attack ground units.

Quick assault unit that applies damage stacks with each attack. Each stack adds +2 bonus damage per attack from any unit, with a maximum of 4 stacks per targeted unit.

Can attack ground units.
Mobile support vehicle. Can heal nearby units and detonate itself with nuclear explosion.

Very tanky suicide unit. Explodes on contact and douses the enemy's ground units in an electromagnetic paste that decreases 50% damage, 20% movement speed, 1.4 per second energy regeneration and 30% max health.

Effect lasts 15 seconds.

Slow firing long range anti-armor support unit.
Can throw Sawblade that deal damage over time.

Can attack ground units.

Heals biological units around it, draining its energy over time.
Its destroyed when the energy is depleted.

Powerful melee unit that deal splash damage.

Can attack ground units.

Massive distance range artillery mech.
Reveals itself while attacking.

Can attack ground units.
Built over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.

Contains Upgrades for Synoid units and structures.

Enables:
- Atrocity from Super Garrison
- Rancor from Super Assembly
- Enthralled from Super Assembly

Contains upgrades for Synoid Mechanical and Air units.

Enables:
- A.R.E.S. from Prospectors
- Psi-Indoctrinator from Myco-Synaptic Choir
- Anathema from Super Hangar

Air-unit production facility.

Enables:
- Griffins
- Warden Airship

Upgraded air-unit production facility with 50% faster production. .

Enables:
- Warden Airship

Anti-air flyer with bonus vs light, can switch to interceptor mode to enable its energy armor and slow down nearby enemy unit.

Can attack air units.

Flying Transport and Support unit, can use defensive matrix and lockdown.

TIP: The Warden Airship takes a bit of time to reach accelerate to its max speed.
Anti-ground, anti armored fast aircraft, can deploy Mag Mines.

Powerful Aerial attack unit. Can deploy Tank Buster mines.

Can attack air units.

Suicide unit. Does damage over a small area on death. Leaves a Disruption Web on detonation, disabling enemy weapons.

Can attack ground units.

Powerful warship with long range weapon, an EMP-PSI Scrambler ability that can disable enemy units and an Ashigara Batteries ability which enable a weapon to attack all ground units nearby..

Can attack ground and air units.

Contains upgrades for Synoid infantry and structures.

Enables:
- Hellstorm Turret from Prospectors
- SatCom Tower from Prospectors
- Midas Igniters from Assembly
- Buoys from Hangar

Contains upgrades for Bloodletters.
Can use Indoctrinate anywhere inside a Requisition Field.

Enables:
- Bloodletters at the Garrisons
